name: Little Kingdoms: Chapters 1-3
description:
"Little Kingdoms: Chapters 1-3" is a prologue to "Little Kingdoms," a medieval real-time strategy game with stylish low-poly graphics and relaxing music. Your goal is to conquer the neighboring kingdoms and grow your empire.

This free version of "Little Kingdoms" comes with 3 story mode playable chapters. This version of "Little Kingdoms" does not include Dynasty Mode or Quick Play Mode.

Similar Games: Galcon, Mushroom Wars, and Eufloria.

Features:

• Story Mode: Play through 3 chapters of "Little Kingdoms."
